title: Teacher's Pets Soft Cloth Books for Baby and Children
features: Perfect for baby showers, birthdays, holidays, and other gift giving events
Handmade by happy Grandma in Indiana
description: These precious cloth books are a wonderful addition to a child’s library, or just soft and cuddly toys to snuggle with anytime.   Bright colors, friendly characters on the pages, and words to comfort and giggle with.  The fabric is 100% cotton, machine washable and dryable, and very durable. A layer of quilt batting is added between the pages for gentle softness.  Whether it’s quiet time for a bedtime story, a take-along for church or other quiet gatherings, or a busy day running errands with your child, these cute little cloth books can easily go along with you, for comfort and activity. Available quantity is READY TO SHIP.
details: {"Manufacturer recommended age": "6 months and up", "Date First Available": "August 11, 2017"}
